allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete e-commerce Flow Caracas

- Add product catalog with MLB, NBA, NFL caps and accessories
- Create shopping cart with WhatsApp checkout integration
- Implement wholesale discount calculator \(10%, 15%, 20%\)
- Add category pages \(MLB, NBA, NFL, Accessories\)
- Create responsive header with cart preview dropdown
- Add hero section with animated gradients
- Implement features, testimonials, and delivery sections
- Create wholesale page with contact form
- Add individual product pages with related items
- Implement local storage cart persistence
- Create Instagram feed and brands sections
- Add store location section
- Full Tailwind CSS styling with custom theme colors
- Framer Motion animations throughout

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
